name: Project:Sphere
description:
Arcade game in 3D, with frenetic action, in which you will have several modes to test your skills. Fight to survive or kill everything you can in this game full of spheres.

You will have several game modes in which you will have to survive, kill and catch the gems that will be on the map.
In each game mode, the map will not always look the same, it will always look different, and in some game modes the map will be generated randomly so that your games will never be the same, both visually and in their structures.

You can change the skin of your sphere as you progress through the game modes, so you can define your style and fight as you like.

In each game mode you will have a type of score that you will be able to improve, with this you will be able to surpass your own marks, as well as to help you in your personalization.

  • Three different game modes
  • Each game mode has different enemies to defeat.
  • One game mode has 3 different locations, each with different enemies.
  • More than 35 Skins to unlock, which you will see in each game mode.
  • High scores, so you can try to beat your own record.
  • compete against the world to get the best score.
  • Different ways to live your experience in each game mode.
  • A game mode with a randomly generated map.
  • A game mode that will always have a different visual design.
  • A game mode, in which the aesthetics of colors will change, just like the enemies!

Fight in each game mode, beat your own scores, get all the skins!
